players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I have important information: Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Accusing me so quickly without proof seems suspicious, Diana. Why would you target me right away? Maybe you're trying to deflect attention from yourself."
Diana: "I understand your suspicion, Charlie, but I’m the detective and my investigation is clear. If you’re innocent, then why are you trying to sow doubt instead of proving yourself?"
Charlie: "Bob has been suspiciously quiet this whole time. If Diana is the detective, she would have more information by now. Maybe Bob is trying to stay under the radar."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
